Package pizzaProgram.gui

This package contains classes for initialization of the various GUIs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdminGUI This class is for initializing the admingui, since adminview is autogenerated and should not be edited.
CookGUI This class is for initializing the cookgui, since cookview is autogenerated and should not be edited, all initialization and hiding/showing is handled by this class.
CustomerWindow Class controlling the GUI element used to add new customers.
DeliverGUI This class is for initilizing the deliverygui, since deliveryview is autogenerated and should not be edited, all initalisation and hiding/showing is handled by this class
DeliveryMap This class is a JPanel that can display a map a marker on the address of the customer of the currently selected order, in addition to a marker on the restaurants address (as specified in the address and city fields for the restaurant in the config table of the database).
OrderGUI The OrderGUI module handles everything that has to do with the Orders view of the program.
ProgramWindow The ProgramWindow class creates the application's main window, with several features attached to it
ReceiptWindow The receipt window shows a new window containing the receipt of an order
 

Package pizzaProgram.gui Description

This package contains classes for initialization of the various GUIs.

The classes set the components' values for text etc to standard values. There is one class for each window in the program.
